title: ABCI Server and Counter Application in Language of Choice
subtitle: Any programming language
requirements: Implement a ABCI server and the Counter application in any programming language
If an implementation already exists in a given language, a new implementation in the same language must be sufficiently justified by awesome features/performance to be considered for the bounty
The implementation must pass the same tests as the Go implementation

title: Bitcoin as a ABCI Application
subtitle: Bitcoin, C++
requirements: Wrap BitcoinCore in a ABCI app
Minimal (ideally none) changes to Bitcoin source code
Must work with some existing client tools for sending transactions

title: Application Grant
subtitle: Something interesting
requirements: Grants are available for certain well thought-out ABCI applications
Rewards will probably hover around the 2 BTC mark, and range anywhere from 0.5 BTC to 10 BTC, depending on the work
Email hello@tendermint.com with 'ABCI Grant' in the subject line to apply
